eu.stratosphere.nephele.template

Class AbstractFileOutputTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.AbstractInvokable
      • eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.AbstractOutputTask
        • eu.stratosphere.nephele.template.AbstractFileOutputTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectoryWriter, FileLineWriter

    public abstract class AbstractFileOutputTask
extends AbstractOutputTask
    Specialized subtype of AbstractOutputTask for tasks which are supposed to write output to a file.
    Author:
    warneke

      Path getFileOutputPath()
      Returns the output path which has been assigned to the original JobFileOutputVertex.

        public Path getFileOutputPath()
        Returns the output path which has been assigned to the original JobFileOutputVertex.
